## Question
What would you like to know?

## Context
- What are you trying to do? (e.g. run install.sh, add a new script)
- What have you already tried or read? (README, CONTRIBUTING, existing issues)

## Environment (if relevant)
- OS and version
- How you're running DevChest (curl, local clone, etc.)
